services.title: Services
services.smmDesc: Increase followers, likes, and views for all platforms.
services.campaignsDesc: Professional management for your campaigns on Google, Meta, and TikTok.
services.agencyDesc: Purchase and manage powerful and reliable ad accounts.
services.designDesc: Professional software and design solutions to meet your needs.

userNav.signOutSuccessDesc: We hope to see you again soon!
userNav.signOutError: Failed to sign out. Please try again.

dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Here's a quick summary of your account. Go ahead and explore our services.
dashboard.welcomeAlertDesc: You're about to embark on a journey to boost your digital presence. Start by exploring our services or adding funds.

quickOrderForm.title: Quick Order
quickOrderForm.description: Order your services quickly from here.
quickOrderForm.fillAllFieldsError: Please fill all fields and select a service.
quickOrderForm.insufficientFundsDesc: Your balance (${{balance}}) is not enough to cover the order cost (${{cost}}).
quickOrderForm.successDesc: Your order is now in progress. You can track it in the order history.

ordersPage.title: Order History
ordersPage.description: Track all your orders and their statuses from here.
ordersPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by ID, service name, or link...
ordersPage.noMatchDescription: Try changing your search terms or filters.

massOrder.title: Mass Order
massOrder.description: Add multiple orders at once to save time and effort.
massOrder.inputDescription: Place each order on a new line in the following format:
massOrder.discountNote: Note: Your rank discount ({{discount}}% - {{rankName}}) will be applied to the final cost.
massOrder.emptyFieldError: Mass order field is empty. Please enter your orders.
massOrder.dataLoadingError: Cannot process orders, service data is loading. Please try again in a moment.

results.fullSuccessDesc: All your orders have been successfully received and are now in progress.
results.partialSuccessDesc: Some of your orders were accepted, while others had issues.

errors.quantityOutOfBounds: Quantity is out of bounds (Min: {{min}}, Max: {{max}}).
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Total Cost: ${{totalCost}}, Your Balance: ${{balance}}.
errors.permissionError: Permission error. Could not update your balance.

analytics.title: Account Analytics
analytics.description: A deep dive into your performance and spending over the last 30 days.

noData.title: Not Enough Data Yet
noData.description: Start placing some orders to see your analytics appear here.

dailySpend.title: Daily Spending
dailySpend.description: A look at your daily spending over the past week.

categorySpend.title: Spending by Category
categorySpend.description: The distribution of your spending across different service types.

api.title: Developer API
api.description: Automate your orders and integrate Hajaty's services into your own applications.

endpoints.title: Endpoint
endpoints.description: All requests must be of type POST to the following URL:

status.title: Order Status (status)
status.description: To check the status of a specific order.

params.order: The Order ID returned upon creation.

services.title: Services List (services)
services.description: To get a list of all available services.

balance.title: Balance
balance.description: To check your current account balance.

responses.title: Responses
responses.description: Examples of responses you can expect from the API.
responses.addSuccess: Successful response when adding an order. The Order ID is returned.
responses.statusSuccess: Successful response when checking an order's status.
responses.servicesSuccess: Successful response when requesting the services list.
responses.balanceSuccess: Successful response when requesting the balance.
responses.errorIncorrect: General error for incorrect requests or missing parameters.
responses.errorFunds: Error for not having enough funds.
responses.errorKey: Error for using an invalid API key.

systemStatus.title: System Status
systemStatus.description: Live monitoring of the performance and health of all Hajaty platform services.

note.title: Note
note.description: This page provides an overview of the health of major systems. If you encounter an issue not listed here, please contact technical support.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and account preferences.

toast.wrongPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect.
toast.tooManyRequests: This account has been temporarily blocked due to many attempts. Try again later.

toast.success: Your profile has been updated successfully.

avatarGenerator.title: AI Avatar Generator
avatarGenerator.description: Describe the image you want and the AI will create it for you.

errors.promptRequired: Please enter a description for the image.

toast.generating: Generating image... this may take a moment.

avatarGenerator.placeholder: Your generated image will appear here.
avatarGenerator.promptPlaceholder: An astronaut in a futuristic suit, cosmic background...

servicesPage.title: Service Catalog
servicesPage.description: Explore all our available services and choose what suits your needs.
servicesPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by ID, name, or category...
servicesPage.noDescription: No description available for this service.

adminUsers.title: User Management
adminUsers.description: View and edit all registered users in the system.
